verbs.description: [V: relive] [ARG1: the best moments of the capitals victory parade] [ARGM-TMP: from the moment devante smith - pelly and t j oshie walked out of capital one arena with smiles on their faces and beers in hand to load the bus] we knew this would be a day to remember caps capitals capitals victory parade
